title: Associate Software Engineer Internship
description:
**Company Description**
  

 FSSSI Global Pvt. Ltd. is a multidisciplinary organization that provides integrated financial, legal, and software solutions designed to meet the specific needs of modern businesses. Established on values of innovation, integrity, and excellence, the company empowers individuals and organizations with secure and future\\-ready services. With expertise in finance, technology, and legal domains, FSSSI Global delivers comprehensive business support, ensuring operational efficiency, compliance, and digital transformation. Their mission is to foster growth and sustainability through innovative, reliable, and technology\\-driven solutions, aiming to build a globally connected business ecosystem.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time remote internship for an Associate Software Engineer. The role involves contributing to software development projects, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, and supporting back\\-end web development processes. Daily tasks include writing, testing, and debugging code, implementing object\\-oriented programming practices, and developing innovative software solutions under the guidance of senior engineers.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Strong foundation in Computer Science concepts and principles
* Experience and skills in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development
* Proficiency in Programming and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP)
* Problem\\-solving skills, analytical mindset, and attention to detail
* Ability to collaborate effectively in a remote team environment
* Familiarity with industry\\-standard software tools and frameworks
* Enthusiasm for learning new technologies and contributing to innovative projects

title: Full-Stack Development Intern
description:
**Full\\-Stack Development Intern** 




**Company:** 
 Webs IT Solution
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Stipend:** 
 Up to ‚Çπ7,500 (Performance\\-Based)
 



**Employment Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is committed to nurturing future\\-ready software developers through live projects, hands\\-on learning, and structured mentorship programs. The organization focuses on building strong front\\-end and back\\-end development capabilities aligned with real\\-world industry standards and modern web technologies.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Full\\-Stack Development Intern, you will gain end\\-to\\-end exposure to modern web application development. This role involves working across the complete development stack‚Äîfrom designing intuitive user interfaces to developing secure and scalable backend systems‚Äîmaking it ideal for candidates aspiring to become full\\-stack developers.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop, and deploy full\\-stack web applications using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB/MySQL
* Build and integrate RESTful APIs to ensure seamless communication between front\\-end and back\\-end systems
* Optimize applications for performance, security, and scalability
* Debug, test, and maintain codebases and repositories
* Collaborate with team members in an agile development environment
* Participate in code reviews and contribute to continuous improvement



**Eligibility \\& Requirements** 



* Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js
* Working knowledge of databases such as MongoDB and MySQL
* Familiarity with REST APIs and version control tools like Git/GitHub
* Strong logical thinking and problem\\-solving abilities
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team\\-oriented environment



**What You Will Gain** 



* Performance\\-based stipend of up to ‚Çπ7,500
* Certificate of Internship upon successful completion
* End\\-to\\-end exposure to real\\-world software development projects
* Mentorship and technical guidance from industry professionals
* Opportunity to build and strengthen a full\\-stack development portfolio
* Potential full\\-time employment opportunity based on performance

title: Associate Software Engineer
description:
**Job Title: Associate Backend Engineer** 




  





**Job Summary:** 
 We are looking for an enthusiastic and motivated Associate Backend Engineer with 1 to 3 years of experience to join our growing engineering team. Whether you're a recent graduate or have some industry experience, this role offers a strong foundation to grow your skills in real\\-world backend development. You‚Äôll work closely with experienced engineers and contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of scalable backend systems that power our products.
 



  





 This position is ideal for individuals who are eager to learn, write production\\-grade code, and grow into a high\\-performing backend engineer.
 



 Website: https://www.thealteroffice.com/about
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Assist in building and maintaining backend services and APIs for web and mobile applications.
* Work with both relational (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis) databases for data modeling and storage.
* Write clean, maintainable, and well\\-documented code under guidance.
* Contribute to authentication, authorization, and other core backend features.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams including product, frontend, and QA to deliver complete features.
* Participate in code reviews and incorporate feedback to improve code quality.
* Debug issues, write unit/integration tests, and help maintain service reliability and performance.
* Learn to work with CI/CD pipelines, version control (Git), and deployment workflows.
* Use tools like Docker, basic cloud services (AWS/GCP/Azure), and optionally explore monitoring/logging tools.
* Explore new technologies such as GraphQL, WebSockets, or message queues (e.g., Kafka, RabbitMQ) when relevant.



**Requirements:** 



* 1 to 2 years of backend development experience, including internships, academic projects, freelance, or open\\-source work.
* Familiarity with at least one backend programming language (e.g., JavaScript, Python, Java, Go, etc.).
* Basic understanding of RESTful APIs, HTTP, databases, and server\\-side logic.
* Exposure to SQL and NoSQL databases and understanding of CRUD operations.
* Familiarity with Git and fundamental development workflows.
* Willingness to learn and apply best practices in scalability, security, and asynchronous programming.
* Strong problem\\-solving mindset and eagerness to take feedback and grow.
* Good communication and collaboration skills in a team environment.

title: Staff Software Engineer
description:
**Job Description** 




 As a Staff Engineer in Data Platform Services team, you'll architect and lead the evolution of metadata services at the heart of our analytics platform: data contracts, the Data Product Catalog, data quality and observability frameworks, and data delivery/subscription systems. Analytics drives everything at Lytx‚Äîfrom collision prevention to driver coaching across 700,000 vehicles worldwide. You'll build the platform capabilities that enable domain teams to confidently deliver analytics\\-powered safety features at multi\\-tenant scale with low\\-latency delivery and enterprise\\-grade governance. If you want to build the platform that makes analytics\\-driven safety possible at scale, this role is for you.
 



**You‚Äôll Get To:** 



* **Architect foundational services that power the entire platform** 
 ‚Äî Design and operate the Registry, Catalog, Data Quality/Observability, and Delivery services that enable hundreds of data products across the organization
* **Define the developer experience** 
 ‚Äî Build contract\\-first APIs and libraries with bulletproof versioning and compatibility guarantees that make domain teams' lives easier and safer
* **Own production excellence** 
 ‚Äî Instrument services with comprehensive observability (metrics, logs, traces) and define SLOs that you'll actually meet, ensuring the platform our teams depend on stays rock\\-solid
* **Multiply team velocity** 
 ‚Äî Partner with domain teams to adopt data contracts, onboard to the catalog, and integrate quality frameworks‚Äîturning platform capabilities into accelerated feature delivery
* **Shape engineering standards** 
 ‚Äî Drive code quality through meaningful reviews, write documentation that developers actually want to read, and elevate team practices that scale
* **Solve performance at scale** 
 ‚Äî Profile and optimize systems handling multi\\-tenant workloads, balancing sub\\-second latency requirements with cost efficiency across 3,000\\+ clients
* **Drive platform evolution** 
 ‚Äî Author Architecture Decision Records (ADRs), champion harvested\\-platform patterns, and push the boundaries of what our infrastructure can enable
* **Stay ahead of the curve** 
 ‚Äî Evaluate emerging technologies in the data platform space and bring forward recommendations that give us competitive advantage



  





**What You‚Äôll Need:** 



* B.E/B Tech in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent experience.
* Enterprise software engineer experience with 10\\+ years‚Äô building scalable back\\-end services and applications.
* Deep design experience in building highly scalable systems/applications in the cloud.
* Strong cloud experience
 **AWS** 
 and container orchestration (Kubernetes) with IaC (Terraform, Helm).
* Expertise in building high scale distributed systems with technologies like Kafka.
* Expert knowledge of object\\-oriented design practices and enterprise patterns.
* Expert level knowledge
 **C\\#, .NetCore**
* Full stack developer knowledge with focus on the front end with Angular or similar web frameworks.
* Design and development experience with microservices, RESTful APIs.
* Expertise in data modelling and working with databases PostgreSQL, MongoDB.
* Ability to collaborate across numerous teams, document ideas, strategies and effectively communicate across teams.
* Passion for working across teams to drive engineering vision and best practices
* Desired experience with Data Platform Engineering services, schema registry, metadata/catalog systems (e.g., OpenMetadata), and data lineage.

title: Founding GTM Engineer
description:
**Anqa Life** 
 is on a mission to redefine consumer fintech. We‚Äôre building at the intersection of long\\-term wealth, insurance, and modern investment vehicles.
 



  





**Founding GTM Engineer** 




 You‚Äôll build and run the technical backbone of our go\\-to\\-market engine: acquisition funnels, analytics, automation, and AI\\-driven growth systems. This is a founding, high\\-ownership role working directly with the founder.
 



  





**What you‚Äôll do** 



* Build and iterate our acquisition funnel end\\-to\\-end (landing pages ‚Üí onboarding ‚Üí conversion)
* Own GTM tooling: CRM, lifecycle messaging, attribution, experimentation, reporting
* Implement product \\+ marketing analytics (event tracking, dashboards, cohorting, funnel analysis)
* Build automation for lead routing, segmentation, follow\\-ups, personalization
* Ship programmatic growth systems (SEO/GEO pages, content pipelines, referral/affiliate mechanics)
* Create internal tools that unblock sales/support/ops and reduce manual work
* Run rapid experiments: form hypotheses, ship, measure, double down



  





**What we‚Äôre looking for** 



* Strong builder: you can ship production\\-quality web products quickly and independently
* Strong data instincts: SQL, analytics tooling, event schemas, attribution, experimentation
* Comfortable stitching systems together via APIs, webhooks, and automation tools
* High ownership in ambiguous, early\\-stage environments
* Must be extremely good with AI tools: power user of LLMs \\+ agent workflows for coding, content, research, automation, and analysis (and you keep up with new tools fast)



  





**Nice to have** 



* Fintech/insurance experience (or strong interest in regulated consumer financial products)
* Experience with SEO/GEO, programmatic landing pages, and lifecycle growth
* Experience building growth loops/referrals, affiliate tracking, or influencer pipelines



  





**Compensation** 



* Competitive salary \\+ ESOPs (details shared in process)



  





**To apply** 




 Email me at anchit@anqa.life with:
 


1. Resume or LinkedIn
2. Two examples of systems you built that drove growth
3. Your favorite AI workflow you use weekly

title: QA Engineer (Jupiter)
description:
Wissen Technology is Hiring for QA Engineer (Jupiter)
   

  

 About Wissen Technology:
   

  

 At Wissen Technology, we deliver niche, custom\\-built products that solve complex business challenges across industries worldwide. Founded in 2015, our core philosophy is built around a strong product engineering mindset‚Äîensuring every solution is architected and delivered right the first time. Today, Wissen Technology has a global footprint with 2000\\+ employees across offices in the US, UK, UAE, India, and Australia . Through a combination of deep domain knowledge, cutting\\-edge technology expertise , and a relentless focus on quality. We don‚Äôt just meet expectations‚Äîwe exceed them by ensuring faster time\\-to\\-market, reduced rework, and greater alignment with client objectives . We have a proven track record of building mission\\-critical systems across industries, including financial services, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, and more. Wissen stands apart through its unique delivery models. Our outcome\\-based projects ensure predictable costs and timelines, while our agile pods provide clients with the flexibility to adapt to their evolving business needs. Wissen leverages its thought leadership and technology prowess to drive superior business outcomes. Our success is powered by top\\-tier t ale nt . Our mission is clear: to be the partner of choice for building world\\-class custom products that deliver exceptional impact‚Äîthe first time, every time.

title: MLE Intern
description:
**Company Description** 




 MockVerse is an AI\\-powered platform designed to bridge the gap between academic learning and real\\-world hiring expectations. By offering role\\-specific mock interviews crafted with insights from industry professionals, MockVerse enables students and early\\-career professionals to practice in realistic, company\\-style environments. The platform provides structured, data\\-driven feedback on skills such as communication, problem\\-solving, technical depth, and articulation, helping users track their progress and improve iteratively. MockVerse also partners with educational institutions to assist in scaling interview readiness and improving student outcomes. Our mission is to make high\\-quality interview preparation accessible to help candidates approach their job opportunities with confidence.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This fully remote MLE Internship at MockVerse is a hands\\-on, system\\-focused role centered on speech systems and conversational AI POCs.
 



 You will work on data migration, data creation, and data management tasks that directly support model development and platform improvements. The role includes exposure to GCP tools and close collaboration with our CTO Arnab.
 



 Ideal for candidates genuinely passionate about machine learning and willing to work on foundational engineering and data tasks that power real\\-world AI systems.
 



  





**Requirements** 



* Strong command over Python
* Ability to understand and work with conversational/interaction data (especially SDE interview\\-style dialogues)
* Exposure to MongoDB, VS Code, GitHub, LLM workflows, and coding assistants (e.g., Antigravity)
* Willingness to work on core engineering tasks including data\\-heavy and operational work
* Genuine curiosity and passion for machine learning beyond buzzwords
* Strong ownership mindset and readiness to learn by building



  





**Nice to Have** 



* Exposure to speech systems, NLP, or LLM\\-based applications
* Familiarity with data preprocessing, annotation, and pipeline creation
* Basic understanding of cloud environments (preferably GCP)



  





**Who Should Apply** 




 Students or recent graduates in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or related fields who want deep, practical exposure to real\\-world ML systems and are comfortable getting their hands dirty working on foundational data and engineering problems that drive meaningful product improvements.

title: Senior Software Engineer (Java FS, React)
description:
Our vision for the future is based on the idea that transforming financial lives starts by giving our people the freedom to transform their own. We have a flexible work environment, and fluid career paths. We not only encourage but celebrate internal mobility. We also recognize the importance of purpose, well\\-being, and work\\-life balance. Within Empower and our communities, we work hard to create a welcoming and inclusive environment, and our associates dedicate thousands of hours to volunteering for causes that matter most to them.
   

  

 Chart your own path and grow your career while helping more customers achieve financial freedom. Empower Yourself.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Senior Full Stack Engineer, you will be involved in all stages of the project lifecycle from requirements to implementation. This position requires the ability to adapt to challenging problems and a desire to work as an essential part of a high performing team. All team members are expected to keep abreast of the latest industry trends, technologies, and frameworks and to display industry competitive skills and techniques.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable full\\-stack applications using Java 21, React, and JavaScript.
* Modernize legacy systems, frameworks and architectures.
* Collaborate with architects and business stakeholders to define and implement technical solutions within the Retirement/Financial Services domain.
* Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and manage deployments on AWS.
* Utilize GitHub Copilot to enhance development productivity and maintain code quality.
* Perform code reviews, provide mentorship to junior developers, and ensure adherence to best practices.
* Analyze and optimize application performance and scalability.
* Maintain and query relational databases, primarily Oracle DB.
* Track and manage project work using JIRA and follow Agile/Scrum methodologies.


**Required Qualifications**
* 5\\+ years of software development experience with strong proficiency in Java (including Java 21\\) and react.
* Cloud experience, preferably AWS, with knowledge of services like EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, and CloudFormation.
* Solid understanding of front\\-end technologies like HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6\\+).
* Experience in modernizing legacy systems through technology stack upgrades, code refactoring and optimization.
* Exposure to microservices architecture and RESTful APIs.

**Nice To Have**

**Education**
* Bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.

description:

title: Senior Salesforce Developer

The Senior Salesforce Developer will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to assess requirements, create scalable solutions, troubleshoot issues, and deliver continuous support. title: Lead Engineer | 1L-2L pm | 5+Y Experience
description:
About the Role:
 



  





 DevDolphins is seeking a hands\\-on Engineering Lead to drive the technical delivery of our enterprise\\-grade projects. You will architect robust solutions, mentor a talented team, and champion quality and innovation in our Hyderabad office. Remote is ok but within max 6 months, you must be open to relocating to Hyderabad.
 



  





 What You'll Do:
 


* Lead the end\\-to\\-end technical delivery of projects using GCP/AWS, React, and Python.
* Write clean, maintainable code and conduct thorough code reviews to elevate team output.

* Advocate for and implement best practices in test\\-driven development (TDD), code quality, and technical debt reduction.
* Leverage AI coding agents to enhance productivity while rigorously reviewing and owning the generated code.
* Collaborate on platform engineering and DevOps initiatives, with a preference for experience in serverless architectures (GCP/AWS).



  





 What We're Looking For:
 


* 5\\+ years of software development experience with a strong command of¬†Python¬†and/or¬†Java.
* Proven experience leading the delivery of¬†enterprise\\-grade projects.
* Deep passion for software craftsmanship, attention to detail, and a debt\\-free technology mindset.
* Strong platform engineering understanding and practical experience with cloud platforms (GCP/AWS preferred).
* A collaborative team player who takes full ownership of projects and their technical outcomes.
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions.



  





 Our Interview Process:
